title: The sound is gone
content:
The sound on my Pixel one have stop working. The only sound I can hear is the sound coming from the bluetooth speaker.

The headjack don't work either.

I have tried changing all volumes in any possible way i can think of... 
- mute/unmute
- slide the volume ranges on all areas.
- toggle disturbe mode
- booted into safe-mode
- turned off bluetooth

(The volume buttons works but it dose not fix the problems.)

I then tried factory reset (twice) it did work for a moment, i could restart the phone after running some updates but once the battery run out while while playing a game with working sound, then the sound stop working all together after that

----

It have gotten much worse since i did my first factory reset.
Before i did the first factory reset i had some issue answering the phone, i could not hear anything so i was always forced to hangup, restart my phone and call back
